tasks.label: CMake Build Release (Ninja)
tasks.command: mkdir -p build && cd build && cmake -DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=Release -DCMAKE_MAKE_PROGRAM=/usr/bin/ninja -G Ninja -S .. -B . && cmake --build . --config Release --target all -- -j4
tasks.detail: Builds the project using CMake with Ninja generator in Release mode.
